thread.title: Steve Jurvetson Resurfaces With His Own Venture Firm

author: Cat Zakrzewski
title: Steve Jurvetson Resurfaces With His Own Venture Firm
text:
Steve Jurvetson unveiled plans for a new venture fund, five months after exiting DFJ, the Silicon Valley firm he co-founded.
Future Ventures will invest in frontier technologies, such as space exploration and quantum computing, according to a website that Mr. Jurvetson shared on his Facebook page on Friday. Mr. Jurvetson is the only founder listed on the website.
